xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 27 January 2014
xwikidoc.content: <sdumitriu> has quit 02:15 <sdumitriu> has joined #phenotips 02:49 <werebutt> has joined #phenotips 02:49 <werebutt> has left #phenotips 11:32 <marta__> has joined #phenotips 15:33 <akats> has joined #phenotips 15:39 <sdumitriu1> akats: So you learned how to rebase a branch once its dependencies are pushed to master, right? 15:46 <akats> This one (#678) wasn't that easy. It didn't want to rebase itself on the central, so first I rebased it on top of issue #681, and then on top of phenotips/master. 15:48 <sdumitriu1> We should probably change your local master branch to reference the upstream master instead of your clone's master 15:48 <sdumitriu1> That should make things easier 15:54 <akats> As long as I keep my issue branches clean and rebase them often on top of the central repo, I should be fine I think. 17:08 <sdumitriu1> akats: Since GitHub doesn't notify when new commits are added to a pull request, can you let me know here when you commit stuff? 17:09 <akats> Ok. I will. 17:55 <akats> Made a commit. Also before I forget once again, today is the last day the email for getting my visitors badge has effect. 17:56 <sdumitriu1> OK 17:57 <akats> has quit 18:11 <marta__> has quit
